channel.title: economy on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Waves of bankruptcies in the US
item.description: ##18:54 Tuesday 15 April 2008 U.S. retail chains caught in a wave of bankruptcies - International Herald Tribune And the changes may force companies to pay suppliers before paying wages or honoring obligations to customers, like redeeming gift cards, said Sally Henry, a partner in the bankruptcy law practice at Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom and the author of several books on bankruptcy. Dang, dog.Â I wonder what’s going to happen in the US.
